Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; band in added white above one in added red; top of rom glazed; exterior: frieze of squares filled with blanks; below, brown line above reserved zone.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1956) (phase 2)
